context: the adenoid bed was examined and was moderately hypertrophied.
adenoid curettes were used to remove this tissue and packs placed.

using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.
following meticulous hemostasis, saline was used to irrigate and no further bleeding noted.
the patient was then allowed to awaken and was brought to the recovery room in stable condition.
